listitem.para: Dropdown restart_mode = Dropdown(name="Restart Mode", value="from_scratch", options=["from_scratch", "restart"])
Text pseudo_dir = Text(name="Pseudopotential File Directory", value="./")
FloatText max_runtime = FloatText(name='Max Run Time (Seconds)', value=10000000)
Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.
FloatText nat = FloatText(name="Number of atoms in the cell system" ,value=1)
FloatText ntyp = FloatText(name="Number of Types of Atoms",value=1)
FloatText ecutwfc = FloatText(name="Wavefunction Kinetic NRG Cutoff (Ry)",min=25.0,max=100.0,value=25.0)
Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.
Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.
list join_line = [' '.join(i) for i in atom_splits]

section.title: atomic_coord_type
section.programlisting: 1 = Dropdown(name="Atomic Coordinate Type", 2 options= ['alat','crystal','cartesian'],value= 'alat', 3 )

section.title: diagonalization
section.programlisting: 1 = Dropdown(name="Diagonalization",value="david", 2 options=["david", "cg", "ppcg", "paro", "rmm-davison"] 3 )

para.computeroutput: FloatText pw_x.ecutwfc = FloatText(name="Wavefunction Kinetic NRG Cutoff (Ry)",min=25.0,max=100.0,value=25.0)

section.title: form_items
section.programlisting: 1 = [ 2 # I AM ADDING NONBREAKING SPACES TO TRY AND FIX THE ALIGNMENT# 3 # IF THERE IS A UNICODE TAB THAT WORKS HERE PLEASE SWAP IT OUT. IT IS CURRENTLY 1:20AM AND I AM EYEBALLING THE AMOUNT OF SPACES 4 5 HBox([Label(value='Material Prefix'), 6 Box([material_prefix, icon_material_prefix]), 7 ], layout=form_item_layout()), 8 9 HBox([Label(value='Restart Mode'), 10 Box([restart_mode, icon_restart_mode]), 11 ], layout=form_item_layout()), 12 13 HBox([Label(value='Pseudopotential File Directory'), 14 Box([pseudo_dir, icon_pseudo_dir]) 15 ], layout=form_item_layout()), 16 17 HBox([Label(value='Current Directory'), 18 Box([outdir, icon_outdir]) 19 ], layout=form_item_layout()), 20 21 HBox([Label(value='Max Run Time (Seconds)'), 22 Box([max_runtime, icon_max_runtime]) 23 ], layout=form_item_layout()), 24 25 HBox([Label(value='Documentation URL:'), documentation_link], layout=Layout()) 26 27 ]

section.title: icon_atom
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='label of the atom. Acceptable syntax:chemical symbol X (1 or 2 characters, case-insensitive) or chemical symbol plus a number or a letter, as in "Xn" (e.g. Fe1) or "X_*" or "X-*"' '\n' 3 '(e.g. C1, C_h; max total length cannot exceed 3 characters)', 4 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_atomic_coord_type
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='Units for ATOMIC_POSITIONS:' '
' 3 4 'alat :' '
' 5 'atomic positions are in cartesian coordinates, in units of the lattice parameter (either celldm(1) or A).' '
' 6 'If no option is specified, "alat" is assumed; not specifying units is DEPRECATED and will no longer be allowed in the future' '
''
' 7 8 'bohr :' '
' 9 'atomic positions are in cartesian coordinate, in atomic units (i.e. Bohr radii)' '
''
' 10 11 'angstrom :' '
' 12 'atomic positions are in cartesian coordinates, in Angstrom' '
''
' 13 14 'crystal :' '
' 15 'atomic positions are in crystal coordinates, i.e.in relative coordinates of the primitive lattice' '
' 16 'vectors as defined either in card CELL_PARAMETERS or via the ibrav + celldm / a,b,c... variables' '
''
' 17 18 'crystal_sg :' '
' 19 'atomic positions are in crystal coordinates, i.e. in relative coordinates of the primitive lattice.' '
' 20 'This option differs from the previous one because in this case only the symmetry inequivalent atoms are given.' '
' 21 'The variable space_group must indicate the space group number used to find the symmetry equivalent atoms.' '
' 22 'The other variables that control this option are uniqueb, origin_choice, and rhombohedral.' 23 24 , 25 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_atomic_mass
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='mass of the atomic species [amu: mass of C = 12]''\n' 3 'Used only when performing Molecular Dynamics run or structural optimization runs using Damped MD.''\n' 4 'Not actually used in all other cases (but stored in data files, so phonon calculations will use these values unless other values are provided)', 5 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_celldm_1
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='SEE DOCUMENTATION LINK BELOW', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_con_threshold
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='Convergence threshold for selfconsistency:''
' 3 'estimated energy error < conv_thr' '
' 4 '(note that conv_thr is extensive, like the total energy).''
' 5 6 'For non-self-consistent calculations, conv_thr is used to set the default value of the threshold (ethr) for iterative diagonalization: see diago_thr_init', 7 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_diagonalization
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='Available options are:''
' 3 4 '"david" :' '
' 5 'Davidson iterative diagonalization with overlap matrix (default). Fast, may in some rare cases fail.''
' '
' 6 7 '"cg" :' '
' 8 'xa0Conjugate-gradient-like band-by-band diagonalization. MUCH slower than "david" but uses less memory and is (a little bit) more robust.' '
''
' 9 10 '"ppcg" :' '
' 11 'xa0PPCG iterative diagonalization' '
''
' 12 13 '"paro", "Par0" :' '
' 14 'ParO iterative diagonalization''
''
' 15 16 '"rmm-davidson", "rmm-paro" :' '
' 17 'RMM-DIIS iterative diagonalization. To stabilize the SCF loop RMM-DIIS is alternated with calls to Davidson or ParO solvers depending on the string used.''
' 18 'Other variables that can be used to tune the behavior of RMM-DIIS are: diago_rmm_ndim and diago_rmm_conv', 19 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

para.para: Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.

section.title: icon_ecutwfc
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='kinetic energy cutoff (Ry) for wavefunctions', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_ibrav
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='crystal structure type, the number maps to a specific structrure that can be looked up in the official documentation''\n''SEE LINK BELOW', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

para.para: Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.

section.title: icon_material_prefix
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='prepended to input/output filenames: \n prefix.wfc, prefix.rho, etc.', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

para.para: Creates the info buttons and adds in the description when you hover your cursor over the button.

section.title: icon_max_runtime
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='Jobs stops after max_seconds CPU time. Use this option in conjunction' '
' 3 'with option restart_mode if you need to split a job too long to' '
' 4 'complete into shorter jobs that fit into your batch queues.' '
' 5 'DEFAULT: 1E7, or 150 days, i.e. no time limit', 6 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_mixing_beta
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='mixing factor for self-consistency', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_nat
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='number of atoms in the unit cell (ALL atoms, except if space_group is set, in which case, INEQUIVALENT atoms)', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_ntyp
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='number of TYPES of atoms in the unit cell', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_outdir
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='input, temporary, output files are found in this directory' '\n' '\n' 3 'DEFAULT: current directory (./)', 4 layout = Layout(width='40px', grid_row_gap='30px', justify_content='flex-start'))

section.title: icon_pseudo_dir
section.programlisting: 1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='directory containing pseudopotential files', 3 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_pseudo_filename
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='File containing PP for this species.' '
' 3 4 'The pseudopotential file is assumed to be in the new UPF format. If it doesnt work, the pseudopotential format is determined by the file name:' '
' 5 6 '*.vdb or *.van Vanderbilt US pseudopotential code' '
' 7 '*.RRKJ3 Andrea Dal Corso"s code (old format)' '
' 8 'none of the above old PWscf norm-conserving format', 9 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

section.title: icon_restart_mode
section.programlisting:
1 = Button( icon='fa-info-circle', 2 tooltip='"from_scratch" : ' '
' ' From scratch. This is the normal way to perform a PWscf calculation' '
' '
' 3 '"restart : "' '
' 'From previous interrupted run. Use this switch only if you want to' '
' 4 'continue, using the same number of processors and parallelization,' '
' 5 'an interrupted calculation. Do not use to start a new one, or to' '
' 6 'perform a non-scf calculations. Works only if the calculation was' '
' 7 'cleanly stopped using variable max_seconds, or by user request' '
' 8 'with an "exit file" (i.e.: create a file "prefix".EXIT, in directory' '
' 9 '"outdir"; see variables prefix, outdir). The default for' '
' 10 'startingwfc and startingpot is set to "file".' 11 , 12 layout = Layout(width='40px'))

para.computeroutput: list pw_x.join_line = [' '.join(i) for i in atom_splits]

section.title: kpoint_type
section.programlisting: 1 = Dropdown(name="K Point Type", value="tplba", 2 options=["tplba", "automatic","crystal"] 3 )

section.title: kpoints_box
section.programlisting: 1 = VBox( 2 [ 3 HBox([Label(value="K Point Type"), kpoint_type], layout=Layout(width='60%')), 4 GridBox([left_section, right_section], 5 layout=Layout(grid_template_columns="repeat(2,20%)", grid_gap="50px")) 6 ])

section.title: left_section
section.programlisting: 1 = VBox( 2 [ 3 4 Box([Label(value='kptx'), kptx], layout=form_item_layout()), 5 Box([Label(value='kpty'), kpty], layout=form_item_layout()), 6 Box([Label(value='kptz'), kptz], layout=form_item_layout()), 7 ])

para.computeroutput: FloatText pw_x.max_runtime = FloatText(name='Max Run Time (Seconds)', value=10000000)
FloatText pw_x.nat = FloatText(name="Number of atoms in the cell system" ,value=1)
FloatText pw_x.ntyp = FloatText(name="Number of Types of Atoms",value=1)
Text pw_x.pseudo_dir = Text(name="Pseudopotential File Directory", value="./")

section.title: pseudo_filename
section.programlisting: 1 = Text(name="Pseudopotential File Name", 2 value='../data/pseudopotentials/sg15_oncv_upf_2jun20/Si_ONCV_PBE-1.2.upf', 3 )

para.computeroutput: Dropdown pw_x.restart_mode = Dropdown(name="Restart Mode", value="from_scratch", options=["from_scratch", "restart"])

section.title: right_section
section.programlisting: 1 = VBox( 2 [ 3 Box([Label(value='offsetx'), offset_x], layout=form_item_layout()), 4 Box([Label(value='offsety'), offset_y], layout=form_item_layout()), 5 Box([Label(value='offsetz'), offset_z], layout=form_item_layout()), 6 ])

section.title: search_sym
